title: Collaborative Learning-Based Remote Education Organization Improvement Strategy

context.additional_context: Improving operations of language education courses for geographically dispersed practitioners requiring asynchronous collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can design a feedback loop system among practitioners using online collaborative learning tools
Learners can diagnose three or more barriers to knowledge flow within an organization through learning network analysis
Learners can develop an action plan to improve remote team collaboration efficiency by 20% or more using asynchronous communication strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
